plot: She's a happy housewife with an up and coming politician for a husband and three successful grown children. Her perfect life is disrupted by conversations with an inner voice that are telling her things that she doesn't want to know.
plot_en: She's a happy housewife with an up and coming politician for a husband and three successful grown children. Her perfect life is disrupted by conversations with an inner voice that are telling her things that she doesn't want to know.
plot_es: She's a happy housewife with an up and coming politician for a husband and three successful grown children. Her perfect life is disrupted by conversations with an inner voice that are telling her things that she doesn't want to know.
title: This American Housewife
